questions.question: Which sentence uses the subjunctive mood correctly?
options: If I was you, I would apologize.
If I were you, I would apologize.
If I am you, I will apologize.
If I would be you, I would apologize.
questions.answer: If I were you, I would apologize.

questions.question: Choose the sentence with the correct usage of a relative pronoun.
options: This is the book whom I told you about.
This is the book who I told you about.
This is the book that I told you about.
This is the book which I told you about.
questions.answer: This is the book that I told you about.

questions.question: Which word means 'a feeling of fear or agitation about something that may happen'?
What is the meaning of the word 'ubiquitous'?
